"Status Ailments": "When characters or enemies are hit by attacks, they are sometimes affected by status ailments."

"For example, the \"burning\" status ailment causes the target to burn for a set period of time, inflicting periodic damage. It can also spread to other nearby targets.  There are a variety of other status ailments, including frozen, shocked, and poisoned."
"Status ailments generally disappear on their own after a set amount of time. You can also cure yourself or allies using the sol atomizer."

"The status ailment icons which display in game are as follows: <pict ac_burn> : Burn <pict ac_frieze> : Freeze <pict ac_shock> : Shock <pict ac_mirage> : Mirage <pict ac_panic> : Panic <pict ac_poison> : Poison"
